titleStmt.title: The gentlemans monitor, or, A sober inspection into the vertues, vices, and ordinary means of the rise and decay of men and families with the authors apology and application to the nobles and gentry of England seasonable for these times / by Edw. Waterhous[e] ...
titleStmt.author: Waterhouse, Edward, 1619-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. for R. Royston ...,
